alert.note: Alert for Collingsworth; Donley; Gray; Wheeler (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued December 12 at 10:41PM CST until December 12 at 11:45PM CST by NWS Amarillo
info.description: The National Weather Service in Amarillo has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southern Wheeler County in the Panhandle of Texas... Southeastern Gray County in the Panhandle of Texas... Collingsworth County in the Panhandle of Texas... Donley County in the Panhandle of Texas... * Until 1145 PM CST. * At 1041 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lelia Lake, or 6 miles east of Clarendon, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Wellington, Clarendon, Shamrock, Mclean, Hedley, Dodson, Lutie, Lelia Lake, Twitty, Lela, Quail, Samnorwood, Dozier and Alanreed. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 AM CST for the Panhandle of Texas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
